skills.name: BUTCHER
desc: • Deal one hit of physical and magic damage to a single target.
• Reduce Max HP on the target by 10%.
• Deal Additional True Damage to the target equal to 10% of their MAX HP, increased to 25% if they are bleeding.
• 50% Chance to Reset and attack again if the target is bleeding. Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.

skills.name: STALK
desc: • Remove All Beneficial Effects, including Golden effects, from all enemies.
• Remove All Negative Effects, including Silver effects, from all allies.
• Gain Lifesteal and Spellvamp for 2 turns.
• Inflict Bleed on each enemy for 2 turns for each instance of Fear on them.
• 85% Chance to gain an Extra Turn.

skills.name: PROWLER
desc: • Remove and Prevent all Immunity and Vanish effects, including Golden effects, on all enemies until they die at the start of battle and at the start of your turn.
• Inflict 4 instances of Fear on random enemies for 1 turn at the start of battle and at the start of your turn.
• 75% Chance to inflict Passive Disable or Perfect Disable on each enemy for 1 turn after every action..
